question: If all bloops are razzies and some razzies are zopps. Can we conclude 'some bloops are zopps'?
passage: Premises: All bloops are razzies. Some razzies are zopps.

question: Alice is older than Bob. Bob is older than Carol. Who is the youngest?
If every A is B and every B is C, is every A C?
passage: All A -> B. All B -> C.
